Blastflower.card_desc: [Weapon] Targets hit by your Weapon Shots take 100 additional damage from you, stacking up to 3 times.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed when Out of Combat.

Flitter.card_desc: [Flutter] Reduce the Cooldown of Flutter by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Hijinks.card_desc: [Flutter] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health when activating Flutter.

Nectar.card_desc: [Seedling] Heal for {scale=75|75} Health after activating Seedling.

Nightshade.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Dead Zone now deals 500 damage when the initial explosion hits an enemy.

Photosynthesis.card_desc: [Seedling] Activating Seedling Grants {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 3s.

Pixie Dust.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health per Second while standing in Dead Zone.

Scorn.card_desc: [Seedling] Increased the damage of each seedling by 350 and reduce their fuse time by 25%.

Shenanigans.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 4s when entering Dead Zone.

Sparkle.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Increase the duration of Dead Zone by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Spritely.card_desc: [Flutter] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction for 3s after activating Flutter.

Sprouts.card_desc: [Seedling] Reduce the Cooldown of Seedling by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy hit by Seedling.

Twilight.card_desc: [Dead Zone] Reduce the Cooldown of Dead Zone by {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Fauna.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=8|8}%.

Feenstaub.card_desc: [Todeszone] Stehst du in der Todeszone, wirst du jede Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Flatterei.card_desc: [Geflatter] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Geflatter um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Flora.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Fotosynthese.card_desc: [Setzling] Die Aktivierung von Setzling erhöht dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Funkeln.card_desc: [Todeszone] Erhöht die Dauer von Todeszone um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Hohn.card_desc: [Setzling] Der Schaden jedes Setzlings wird um 350 erhöht und die Zeit bis zur Zündung um 25% reduziert.

Keimung.card_desc: [Setzling] Die Aktivierung von Setzling erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

Klamauk.card_desc: [Todeszone] Betrittst du die Todeszone, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Kolibri.card_desc: [Geflatter] Die Aktivierung von Geflatter erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

Nachtschatten.card_desc: [Todeszone] Todeszone verursacht nun 500 Schaden, wenn die erste Explosion einen Gegner trifft.

Nektar.card_desc: [Setzling] Nach Aktivierung von Setzling wirst du {scale=75|75} LP geheilt.

Possen.card_desc: [Geflatter] Bei Aktivierung von Geflatter wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Quicklebendig.card_desc: [Geflatter] Nach Aktivierung von Geflatter wird erlittener Schaden 3s lang um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Sprengblume.card_desc: [Waffe] Von dir getroffene Ziele erleiden durch deine Waffenschüsse zusätzlich 100 Schaden. Bis zu 3-mal stapelbar.

Triebe.card_desc: [Setzling] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Setzling für jeden mit Setzling getroffenen Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Zwielicht.card_desc: [Todeszone] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Todeszone um {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Belladone.card_desc: [Zone morte] L'explosion initiale de Zone morte inflige 500 dégâts.

Colibri.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Activer Battement d'ailes rend {scale=1|1} munitions(s).

Cr\u00e9dulit\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Cr\u00e9puscule.card_desc: [Zone morte] Zone morte se recharge {scale=0.7|0.7}s plus vite.

D\u00e9dain.card_desc: [Semis] Chaque semis inflige 350 dégâts de plus, et le délai avant l'explosion est réduit de 25%.

\u00c9tincelle.card_desc: [Zone morte] Zone morte dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

Faune.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Feu follet.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins pendant 3s après Battement d'ailes.

Fleur explosive.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque tir d'arme augmente vos dégâts de 100 contre la cible touchée. Effet cumulable 3 fois.

Frasques.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Battement d'ailes vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Jeune pousse.card_desc: [Semis] Semis se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite pour chaque ennemi atteint.

Manigance.card_desc: [Zone morte] Passer dans Zone morte augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Photosynth\u00e8se.card_desc: [Semis] Activer Semis augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Poussi\u00e8re de f\u00e9e.card_desc: [Zone morte] Dans la Zone morte, vous récupérez {scale=50|50} PV par seconde.

Singeries.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Vol d'oiseau.card_desc: [Battement d'ailes] Battement d'ailes se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

\u4ed9\u9732\u743c\u6d46.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u5149\u5408\u4f5c\u7528.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后，3秒内移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u53e4\u7075\u7cbe\u602a.card_desc: [武器] 武器装填速度提高{scale=5|5}%

\u53fd\u55b3\u8702\u9e1f.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u542b\u82de\u5f85\u653e.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 爆裂之种每命中一个敌人，冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u6574\u4eba\u628a\u620f.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 进入枯萎禁区后移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u66ae\u5149\u4e4b\u606f.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 枯萎禁区的冷却时间缩短{scale=0.7|0.7}秒

\u73a9\u800d\u5b09\u620f.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u751f\u6839\u53d1\u82bd.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 激活爆裂之种后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u76f8\u4fe1\u6211\uff01.card_desc: [护甲] 参与击败可以使所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u7cbe\u7075\u7c89\u672b.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 站在枯萎禁区内每秒回复{scale=25|25}点生命值

\u7efd\u653e\u4e4b\u82b1.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击每次命中目标时伤害都会提高100点，最多叠加3次。

\u7fa4\u517d\u5954\u817e.card_desc: [护甲] 脱离战斗后移动速度提升{scale=8|8}%

\u81ea\u5728\u98de\u7fd4.card_desc: [振翅] 振翅的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u8511\u89c6\u4e4b\u79cd.card_desc: [爆裂之种] 每颗爆裂之种造成的伤害提高350点，引爆时间缩短25%

\u95ea\u95ea\u53d1\u5149.card_desc: [枯萎禁区] 枯萎禁区的持续时间提高{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u968f\u98ce\u821e\u52a8.card_desc: [振翅] 使用振翅后3秒内，受到的伤害降低{scale=5|5}%

\u00a1Cree!.card_desc: [Armadura] Las eliminaciones reducen las recargas activas un {scale=10|10}%.

Aleteo.card_desc: [Aleteo] Se reduce la recarga de Aleteo en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Belladona.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Zona muerta inflige ahora 500 PS de daño cuando la explosión inicial alcanza a un enemigo.

Bomba floral.card_desc: [Arma] Los objetivos que alcances con tu arma reciben 100 PS adicionales de daño. Se acumula hasta 3 veces.

Briosa.card_desc: [Aleteo] Obtienes un {scale=5|5}% de reducción de daño durante 3 s después de activar Aleteo.

Colibr\u00ed.card_desc: [Aleteo] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Aleteo.

Crep\u00fasculo.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Se reduce su recarga en {scale=0.7|0.7} s.

Desprecio.card_desc: [Plántula] Aumenta el daño de cada Plántula en 350 PS y reduce el tiempo de detonación un 25%.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento mientras estés fuera de combate.

Fotos\u00edntesis.card_desc: [Plántula] Activar Plántula otorga un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 3s.

Germinaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Plántula] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Plántula.

Graciosa.card_desc: [Aleteo] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras activar Aleteo.

N\u00e9ctar.card_desc: [Plántula] Te curas {scale=75|75} PS tras activar Plántula.

Polvo de hada.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por cada segundo dentro de la Zona muerta.

Reto\u00f1o.card_desc: [Plántula] La recarga de Plántula se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo alcanzado.

Travesuras.card_desc: [Zona muerta] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 4s cuando entras a Zona muerta.

Ardil.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Ganha {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 4s ao entrar na Zona Morta.

Arrebol.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Reduz o intervalo da Zona Morta em {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Basta Acreditar.card_desc: [Armadura] Eliminações reduzem em {scale=10|10}% todos os intervalos ativos.

Brotos.card_desc: [Semeadura] Reduz o intervalo da Semeadura em {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada inimigo atingido pela habilidade.

Clar\u00e3o.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Aumenta a duração de Zona Morta em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Esc\u00e1rnio.card_desc: [Semeadura] Aumenta o dano de cada semente em 350 e reduz o tempo de explosão em 25%.

Fauna.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento quando estiver fora do combate.

Flor Explosiva.card_desc: [Arma] Alvos atingidos por seus ataques recebem dano adicional de 100, acumulados até 3 vezes.

Fotoss\u00edntese.card_desc: [Semeadura] Ativar Semeadura concede {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento por 3s.

N\u00e9ctar.card_desc: [Semeadura] Cura {scale=75|75} de vida ao ativar Semeadura.

Palha\u00e7adas.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=5|5}%.

P\u00f3 de Fada.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Cura em {scale=50|50} a cada segundo em que estiver na Zona Morta.

Sombra da Noite.card_desc: [Zona Morta] Zona Morta agora causa 500 de dano quando a explosão inicial atinge o inimigo.

Trote.card_desc: [Flutuar] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} ao ativar Flutuar.

V\u00edvida.card_desc: [Flutuar] Ganha {scale=5|5}% de redução de dano por 3s ao ativar Flutuar.

Zanzando.card_desc: [Flutuar] Reduz o intervalo de Flutuar em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

\u0412\u0437\u0440\u044b\u0432\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Цели, задетые вашими выстрелами, получают на 100 ед. больше урона. Эффект может суммироваться до 3 раз.

\u0412\u043e\u043b\u0448\u0435\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] При нахождении в Мертвой зоне вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду.
[Переполох] После активации Переполоха вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона в течение 3 с.

\u0418\u0441\u043a\u0440\u0430.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Длительность Мертвой зоны увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041d\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0430\u0440.card_desc: [Саженец] Активация Саженца исцеляет вас на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u041e\u0437\u043e\u0440\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Переполох] Активация Переполоха исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041f\u0430\u0441\u043b\u0435\u043d.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Мертвая зона наносит 500 ед. урона, если начальный взрыв задел врага.

\u041f\u043e\u0431\u0435\u0433\u0438.card_desc: [Саженец] Каждое попадание Саженцем по врагу сокращает перезарядку способности на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041f\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0440\u044c \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041f\u0440\u0435\u0437\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Саженец] Каждый саженец наносит на 350 ед. урона больше, а время до взрыва уменьшается на 25%.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043a\u0430\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] При попадании в Мертвую зону ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с.

\u0421\u0443\u043c\u0435\u0440\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Мертвая зона] Перезарядка Мертвой зоны сокращается на {scale=0.7|0.7} с.

\u0424\u0430\u0443\u043d\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%, когда вы находитесь вне боя.

\u0424\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0441\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Саженец] Активация Саженца увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

Fauna.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

Fotosynteza.card_desc: [Kiełek] Aktywacja Kiełka zapewnia {scale=10|10}% do szybkości ruchu na 3 s.

Iskrzenie.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Wydłuża czas trwania Martwej strefy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Kombinowanie.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Wejście w Martwą strefę zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 4 s.

Lekko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Trzepot] Zapewnia {scale=5|5}% redukcji obrażeń przez 3 od aktywacji Trzepotu.

\u0141opot.card_desc: [Trzepot] Skraca czas odnowienia Trzepotu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Mrok nocy.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Martwa strefa zadaje teraz 500 obrażeń, kiedy pierwsza eksplozja trafi wroga.

P\u0119dy.card_desc: [Kiełek] Skraca czas odnowienia Kiełka o {scale=0.5|0.5} s., jeśli trafisz nim przeciwnika.

Pogarda.card_desc: [Kiełek] Zwiększa obrażenia od każdego Kiełka o 350 pkt. i skraca czas spalania lontu o 25%.

Uwierz w siebie!.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Wr\u00f3\u017ckowy py\u0142.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ na sekundę podczas przebywania w Martwej strefie.

Wybuchowy kwiat.card_desc: [Broń] Trafione z broni cele odnoszą dodatkowe 100 obrażeń. Efekt kumuluje się do 3 razy.

Zmierzch.card_desc: [Martwa strefa] Skraca czas odnowienia Martwej strefy o {scale=0.7|0.7} s.

Alacakaranl\u0131k.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.7|0.7} sn azalt.

A\u015fa\u011f\u0131lama.card_desc: [Fide] Her fidenin hasarı 350 birim artar ve patlama süresi %25 azalır.

\u00c7i\u00e7ek Patlamas\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Silah Atışların ile vurduğun hedefler 100 ek hasar alırlar. Bu etki 3 defaya kadar birikir.

\u00c7\u0131rp\u0131nma.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Filizler.card_desc: [Fide] Fide ile vurduğun her düşman için Fide'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Fotosentez.card_desc: [Fide] Fide'yi etkinleştirmek 3 saniye boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı verir.

Hayaletsi.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra 3 sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

\u0130nan Yeter!.card_desc: [Zırh] Saf dışı bırakmalar aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azaltır.

\u0130t\u00fcz\u00fcm\u00fc.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge artık ilk patlama bir düşmana vurduğunda 500 hasar veriyor.

Muziplik.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'ye girince 4 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Par\u0131lt\u0131.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'nin süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn artır.

Peri Tozu.card_desc: [Ölü Bölge] Ölü Bölge'de dururken saniyede {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

\u015eamata.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirdiğinde {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Sinek Ku\u015fu.card_desc: [Kanat Çırp] Kanat Çırp'ı etkinleştirmek {scale=1|1} Cephane oluşturur.
